entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 a.m. NDT Monday 8 May 2023
